Class Booking

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Booking
public class Booking extends Object
Represents a flight booking in the system. Links customers to flights and tracks booking details including pricing and fees.
Author:
M9

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(Customer customer, Flight outboundFlight, LocalDate bookingDate)
      Constructs a new one-way Booking.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer making the booking
      outboundFlight - the outbound flight being booked
      bookingDate - the date of booking

    • Booking

      public Booking(Customer customer, Flight outboundFlight, Flight returnFlight, LocalDate bookingDate)
      Constructs a new Booking (one-way or round-trip).
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer making the booking
      outboundFlight - the outbound flight being booked
      returnFlight - the return flight (null for one-way)
      bookingDate - the date of booking
